DOC.TEXT: Here are the major business events and economic events scheduled for the coming week (some dates are tentative; times are EST):
Financial markets, government offices, banks and most businesses closed for Christmas holiday.
WASHINGTON _ The U.S. Postal Service begins distributing 1989 tax forms to citizens across the country.
WASHINGTON _ Existing home sales for November will be released by the National Association of Realtors.
WASHINGTON _ Commerce Department will hold a news conference to release the agency's 1990 Industrial Outlook report at 10:30 a.m.
WASHINGTON _ The Commerce Department will release the leading indicators for November at 8:30 a.m.
